rules_text:
Enchant opponent
When Curse of the Sea’s Bounty enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue and red Pirate creature token.
Whenever a creature attacks enchanted player, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
notes:
BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
